questiontext.text:
The variables \(X_1\), \(X_2\), â€¦ are independent with mean \(5\) and variance \(7\).

Let \(S = X_{2} + X_{3} + \ldots + X_{6}\).

Find partial correlation \(\mathrm{pCorr}(X_1, X_1 + X_2; S)\).

generalfeedback.text: Find the correlation between \(X_1\) and \(X_1+X_2 - \beta (X_{2} + X_{3} + \ldots + X_{6})\). Note, that \(\hat{\beta}_{OLS} \to \beta\), as \(n\to \infty\)
